content.title: <TextStyle.Orange>Welcome Survivor!</>
content.text:
Welcome to the <TextStyle.LightBlue>[DE/EN] Khali PvP Cluster ‚Äì ASA!</>

Fast-paced PvP, fair rules, active admins ‚Äì and chaos with style.

<TextStyle.Yellow>üìà Server Rates:</>
- XP: x5 | Harvest: x5 | Taming: x5
- Maturation: x25 | Hatch: x50
- Mating Interval: 0.125 | Imprint Interval: 0.0625 | Imprint Multiplier: x2.5

<TextStyle.Red>‚öîÔ∏è Player Stats:</>
- HP: +15 | Melee: +10 | Weight: +75 | Fortitude: +5
- -50% stamina drain

<TextStyle.Violet>ü¶ñ Dino Stats:</>
- Weight per point: x7.5

Join our <RichColor Color="0,0.8,1,1">Discord</> for events, kits & help:
<RichColor Color="0,0.6,1,1">https://discord.gg/2fb6mBfT3j</>

content.title: <TextStyle.Yellow>‚öíÔ∏è Base / Building Rules</>
content.text:
- No building in mesh or exploit spots
- No unreachable locations (e.g. chair/grappling hook only)
- Spam allowed, but not excessive
- No flying structures or floating turrets
- Max 1 main base per map + small outposts
- One cave per tribe across the entire cluster
- No building on obelisks (except boss turrets)
- ‚ùå Blocked: Swamp Cave (Island)

content.title: <TextStyle.Red>‚ò†Ô∏è PvP / Raid Rules</>
content.text:
- No mesh raiding
- Max. 1 hour caging
- No tunnel builds/raids
- Platform dinos must have one fully open side
- No popcorning, despawning, or loot transfers during raids
- Counterraids allowed ‚Äì must be completed

content.title: <TextStyle.Violet>ü´Ç Tribe & Character Rules</>
content.text:
- Consistent tribe name cluster-wide
- No insiding ‚Äì zero tolerance
- No racist, sexist, or offensive names (you'll be renamed)
- Clear player names only (no '123', 'Human', etc.)
- Tribes are accountable for all members

content.title: <TextStyle.Blue>ü´° Admin Rules</>
content.text:
- No attacking or blocking admin structures (Tribe 'Admin')
- Admins are human ‚Äì mistakes happen
- Report abuse with screenshots or video
